name: tm34
effect: Teaches Shock Wave to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Sludge Wave to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Shock Wave Gen II: Swagger Gen I: Bide)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Zaps the foe with a
jolt of electricity
that never misses.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Zaps the foe with a
jolt of electricity
that never misses.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A rapid jolt of
electricity strikes
the foe. It can’t
be evaded.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user strikes the foe with a quick
jolt of electricity. This attack cannot
be evaded.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user strikes the foe with a quick
jolt of electricity. This attack cannot
be evaded.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user strikes the foe with a quick
jolt of electricity. This attack cannot
be evaded.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
It swamps the area around the user
with a giant sludge wave.
It may also poison those hit.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
It swamps the area around the user
with a giant sludge wave.
It may also poison those hit.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user strikes everything around it by
swamping the area with a giant sludge wave.
This may also poison those hit.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user strikes everything around it by swamping
the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also
poison those hit.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user strikes everything around it by swamping
the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also
poison those hit.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The target is attacked with a shock wave generated
by the user’s gaping mouth.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering
up Fire-type moves. It lowers the power of
Water-type moves.
